abstract: An agency that enforces antimonopoly laws visited company offices in four cities, as the country more closely scrutinizes multinational companies.
snippet: An agency that enforces antimonopoly laws visited company offices in four cities, as the country more closely scrutinizes multinational companies.
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — China, once the hottest growth market for United States technology companies, is turning chillier.

headline.main: With Microsoft in Sights, China Starts to Squeeze U.S. Tech Companies
headline.print_headline: China Starts to Squeeze Tech Firms From U.S.

byline.original: By Andrew Jacobs, Chris Buckley and Nick Wingfield
